basic.description: This is a seminar and course, with an emphasis on communication skills and professional practice. A writing module develops technical writing skills. Students give an engineering presentation to develop their presentation skills. Seminars are given by faculty from the Mathematics and Engineering program, by Mathematics and Engineering alumni on the career paths since completing the program, and by visiting speakers on a variety of professional practice matters, on topics such as workplace safety, workplace equity and human rights, and professional organizations.  Open to Mathematics and Engineering students only.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Mathematics and Engineering Seminar

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program
